survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Office Noise Reduction Solutions Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction with current noise reduction solutions in the office and identify potential areas for improvement to enhance productivity and well-being.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current noise reduction solutions in your office?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current noise reduction solutions in your office?

questions.question_text: Which of the following noise reduction solutions do you currently use in your workspace? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture a comprehensive view of current solutions.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice (checkboxes), with an 'Other' option as open-text.

script.question_text: Which of the following noise reduction solutions do you currently use in your workspace? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What additional noise reduction solutions would you like to see implemented in the office?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What additional noise reduction solutions would you like to see implemented in the office?

questions.question_text: How often do you experience disruptions due to noise in your workspace?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to quantify noise disruption levels.

script.question_text: How often do you experience disruptions due to noise in your workspace?

questions.question_text: Do you believe improved noise reduction solutions would enhance your productivity?
questions.client_notes: Include a 'No effect' option to capture neutral responses.

script.question_text: Do you believe improved noise reduction solutions would enhance your productivity?
